ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We are thankful to Maria Luisa Prieto-Linde (SLU, Alnarp, Sweden) for practical assistance in follow up of plants in the growth chambers and in the different analyses in the laboratory. Mariette Andersson and Helle Turesson (SLU, Alnarp, Sweden) assistance in amylose content determination is acknowledged. We acknowledge Lund University for allowing us to use their facilities in determining the gelatinisation temperature.
